izerop redux

11 May 2023

Hi there, it’s been 20 years…

izerop was first launched in 2003, with the help of my friends before my 18th birthday. The project, at the time, lasted about a year before it came to an abrupt end. However, the saga continues…

Today, I am announcing a beta launch of the project to a wider audience. Feel free to join and help me solidify this product.

See it live @ izerop.com

Thank you!
